models.moves

Class Move

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.moves.Move
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicMove, TrickyMove

    public abstract class Move
extends java.lang.Object
    Create an object that allow the manipulation of a Card from a origin Player to his target (can be himself).
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Simon RENOULT

    • Method Detail

      • realize

        public abstract boolean realize()
                         throws IllegalCardTypeException
        Executes the move using the origin player and the card he chosses to play on the target.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalCardTypeException

      • targetIsCompatible

        public abstract boolean targetIsCompatible(Player targetPlayer)
                                    throws IllegalMoveException
        Perform a verification on target player. As the verification content depends on the type of move, the method is set as abstract and is used through a final method : setTarget(Player).
        Parameters:
        targetPlayer -
        Returns:
        True if the target is compatible , else false.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException

      • setTarget

        public final boolean setTarget(Player targetPlayer)
                        throws IllegalMoveException,
                               java.lang.IllegalAccessError
        Define the target of the chosen card
        => "Methods" design pattern.
        Parameters:
        targetPlayer - Target chosen for the selected card.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - Target cannot be chosen with this card.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessError - No card previously selected.
